article_metadata.news-keywords: georgia, deal, health care, muscogee, sheriff, bible, malachi, tolerance
article_metadata.description: As a former office holder and county GOP chair, I have been generally critical of where my party is headed on social issues. So, it was a pleasant surprise when Gov. Deal vetoed the campus carry bill.
article_metadata.title: Surprise us, Governor | Columbus Ledger-Enquirer

og.description: As a former office holder and county GOP chair, I have been generally critical of where my party is headed on social issues. So, it was a pleasant surprise when Gov. Deal vetoed the campus carry bill.
